message: Starting critique: gathering phase handover and agent findings
Analyzing task structure and test execution - no detailed findings preserved, evaluating system behavior
Analysis complete - preparing senior dev critique on SQLite migration status

CRITIQUE COMPLETE (submission tool broken): SQLite migration is INCOMPLETE and PREMATURE. Found: (1) Empty SQLite DBs with no schema while JSON registries handle all data, (2) Critical schema bug - missing 'final_verdict' column breaks submit_review_verdict() AND submit_critique(), (3) No migration strategy/scripts/versioning, (4) Integration testing before unit tests. RECOMMENDATION: Revert to JSON, design complete SQLite schema, build migration tooling, add unit tests, THEN re-attempt. Test successfully validated that agent protocol works (deploy→review→phase advance), but data layer is broken. Peer reviewers confirmed same schema issue independently.
